title: BioMedia Grand Challenge
subtitle: competition
description: The Biomedia Grand Challenge focuses on the emerging field of medical multimedia where the task is to detect and classify both normal and abnormal findings in the gastrointestinal tract.

title: MediaEval Medico
subtitle: competition
description: The 2019 MediaEval Medico task tackles the challenge of predicting semen quality using microscope videos of human sperm and associated participant data.
